typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		emp_id as string,
		emp_name as string,
		emp_surname as string,
		emp_designation_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(emp_id=='2',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Fullname = concat(emp_name, emp_surname),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outputfille'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
